task: Develop a basic 'Grim Fandango' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Destroy - nothing - the most important thing'.
name: Afterlife Echoes

branding_data.short_description: Navigate the surreal underworld in 'Afterlife Echoes', where the most vital elements have been mysteriously erased.
branding_data.detailed_description: 'Afterlife Echoes' is an adventure game inspired by 'Grim Fandango', set in a vibrant yet eerie underworld. Players assume the role of a lost soul navigating through a realm where the most crucial components of existence have inexplicably vanished. The absence of these elements creates a world of chaos and mystery, challenging players to unravel the secrets behind this destruction. The game combines noir-style storytelling with dark humor and unique puzzles, encouraging players to think creatively and adapt to a world where the expected rules no longer apply.

strategy: Destroy - nothing - the most important thing
